pageContext.description: Dimensions: EL 61mm; EW 28.5mm; EB 13.8mm; EDs 25mm; Wt. 27.3 gms,Typology: Rounded midrib, but with slight angles running down either side; hints of original edge bevel close to broken edges,Condition: Main break, perforation, and much of blade edges dirty and fresh breaks; perforation punched through crudely, leaving large internal flange,Attached material: Yellow-brown soil in socket and around perforation
pageContext.surface: Smooth silky (polished?) grass green patina largely intact, especially on reverse face; chipped mainly along edges in few places, to pale bluey-green dusty surface; limited gouging of midribs probably recent.
pageContext.collection: Merredew, Mr. Tony - private (1981),25 Dartmouth House, Elmwood Road, W. Croydon
pageContext.remarks: Archive: PIF; AFI,PRBAF: DF (S); SI,Ext.: RSO 31/7/81; CI,Rec.: SN Sept 81,Source: Sb. A.
